product_summary: Tune Studio is a fine-tuning and deployment platform for open-source large language models (LLMs), allowing developers to build and ship GenAI applications with confidence. It offers a sandbox environment for experimenting with different LLMs, training custom models, and deploying them using public APIs or via integrations with TGI, vLLM, or Triton. Tune Studio is trusted by over 320K users and has deployed over 1K LLMs.
product_pros: Ultimate sandbox for experimenting with any LLM
Ability to save interactions as high-quality datasets
Training of custom LLMs on top-tier hardware
Optimization of performance and reduction of development time
Deployment via public APIs or integration with TGI, vLLM, or Triton

product_usecases.details: Tune Studio can be used to develop AI-powered business applications, such as chatbots, virtual assistants, and language translation tools.
The tool can assist with creative writing tasks, such as generating story ideas, writing poems, and creating marketing copy.
Tune Studio can be used as a conversational AI, engaging in casual conversations and providing information on a wide range of topics.
The tool can generate code in multiple programming languages, making it useful for developers looking to automate coding tasks.
Tune Studio can be used to analyze large amounts of text data, extracting insights and trends.

product_toolfor.details: Tune Studio provides a comprehensive set of tools and features tailored to the needs of developers, enabling them to build and deploy GenAI applications efficiently.
The platform offers a sandbox environment for experimenting with different LLMs and training custom models, making it an ideal tool for researchers exploring the capabilities of LLMs.
Tune Studio can help businesses integrate AI into their operations, leveraging the power of LLMs to enhance customer engagement, automate tasks, and gain insights from data.
The platform can be used as a teaching tool for courses on AI, natural language processing, and machine learning.
Tune Studio provides a hands-on environment for students to learn about LLMs and develop AI applications.

product_pricing: The pricing information for Tune Studio is not available on the provided website.
